headline: Mastercard in a Spree to Boost Cross-Border Payments in the UAE
summary: MA teams with Worldpay and Zand to fast-track secure, card-based cross-border payouts across the UAE using Mastercard Move.

headline: Mastercard's social impact leader explains why financial education can't be forced
summary: On an episode of Yahoo Finance’s Living Not So Fabulously podcast, Shamina Singh, the president of Mastercard’s Center for Inclusive Growth, explained that financial tools and education are most effective when they're designed around the moments someone will actually need to use them in the real world.

raw.headline: Mastercard's social impact leader explains why financial education can't be forced

headline: Mastercard's Raja Rajamannar Named 2025 ARF CMO Award Winner

headline: Mastercard Introduces New Tools for B2B Payment Automation
summary: Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) is one of the 9 Best NYSE Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On July 29, Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) announced the global launch of its automated solution called Mastercard Receivables Manager, which makes accepting virtual card payments more efficient, secure, and cost-effective for businesses. Mastercard Receivables Manager brings strong capabilities like […]
